MDARA.RG.summary: AS MADARA Cosmetics, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural cosmetics and personal care products under the MADARA and MOSSA brand names in the Baltic and Northern European region. The company offers face, anti-age, body, hair, perfume, and mother and baby products, as well as products for men. It also provides contract manufacturing services for cosmetic products. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries, primarily within the European Union. It offers its products through retailers, as well as online. AS MADARA Cosmetics was founded in 2006 and is based in Marupe, Latvia.
